participant_1.background:
My pets are a source of endless inspiration for my writing.
I have a house with a home gym so my kids can visit me when they want.
i am the youngest of 4 children.
Comic Con is not my thing but I do love teaching and travelling.
I enjoy the thrill of playing tennis and the freedom of driving my restored Mustang.

participant_2.background:
I used to spend all my free time playing video games, but now I prefer to go on adventures with my dog.
I'm proud of my ability to keep a positive attitude even when things are tough.
i know how to play the guitar.
i own a ford truck.
I secretly watch baseball games on my phone while I water my sunflowers every morning.

content.text: What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love going on adventures with my dog! It's so much fun to explore new places and make memories together.
Sounds really fun! I wish I had a dog.
You should get one! They're the best companions.
I know, I've been thinking about it.
What kind of dog would you want?
I'm not sure. Maybe a golden retriever or a Labrador retriever.
Those are both great breeds! They're both very friendly and loving.
Yeah, I think they'd be a great fit for me.
I'm sure you'd be a great dog owner!
Thanks! I'm excited to get one someday.
Me too! It'll be a lot of fun.
So, what do you like to do when you're not with your dog?
I love to play guitar, watch baseball games, and water my sunflowers.
That sounds really nice! I love sunflowers.
Me too! They're so beautiful.
Do you have any other hobbies?
I used to spend all my free time playing video games, but now I prefer to go on adventures with my dog.
That's cool! I've never been much of a gamer, but I can see how it could be fun.
Yeah, it's a lot of fun. But it's also nice to get out and explore the world with your dog.
I agree! I love going on adventures.
Me too! It's so much fun to explore new places and make memories together
